popularityCurve.label: how will the considerable talent recruited in the last few years congeal into a unified force this season

clusterList.phrase: how will the considerable talent recruited in the last few years congeal into a unified force this season

i think that if you look across the board you will see a certain amount of attrition in most programs we want to try and continue to develop the players and the program now and compliment them with the best talent that we can recruit
we want to give them the best chance to perform

our primary market for recruiting is going to be this region i love developing talent in west virginia virtually every athlete that has gone through the program that i've been working with for 9 years has made significant improvement
the australian side has an excellent team of staff and i'm excited about the opportunity work with them and gain experience at international level
as head of recruiting it is my intention to personally assess the very best of this talent in the hope that they may join us
